galleries.name: Highlands
galleries.metaDescription: Stunning landscape images of the Scottish highlands and islands, including Skye, St. Kilda, Lewis and Harris and Arran.

galleries.name: Landscapes
galleries.metaDescription: Landscape photographs by Mark Fisher. Stunning images of England, Wales, the United States and more.

galleries.name: Animals
galleries.metaDescription: Nature photos by Mark Fisher from the UK and Africa.

galleries.name: Plants
galleries.metaDescription: From lilies to lime trees, and birch to bracken - photographs of plants and trees by Mark Fisher.

galleries.name: Dusk to Dawn
galleries.metaDescription: A collection of photos taken after the sun has set, or when it is not yet risen. More of the former, as Mark is an expert sleeper.

galleries.name: City
galleries.metaDescription: Urban photographs of the UK, Europe and the United States by Mark Fisher.

galleries.name: People
galleries.metaDescription: On rare occasions, I pluck up the courage to point my camera at other people. Here are the results.
